-   **How will the climate be in Norway in 2100?** <br> We found that
    82.5% of the mountain areas in Norway currently above the forest
    line will grow forest. This means fewer alpine areas (if the forest
    keeps pace with climate change, it will probably lag). This
    projection was base on the RCP 4.5 pathway for the period 2071-2100.
    Here you can find the interactive website
    [NRK](https://nrk.no/klima/kommune)
